name: MbPc Pagerank Simulator
short_description: Provide a testbed to play with pagerank-like algorithm on graph. You can easily add vertices, edges, save the graph for reuse, etc. For now, only Pagerank is implemented, but in the future, other algorithms will be added.
summary: Testbed for playing with the algorithm "pagerank" of Google
